description: The Targus Lap Chill Mat Jr. is a more compact version of the original Lap Chill Mat. Constructed of the same materials, it provides a comfortable and ergonomic work surface to keep you and your laptop cool. The Chill Mat Jr. rests on your lap and disperses heat, using a fan to provide ventilation which can be obstructed if the laptop is used on a pillow or comforter. Simply plug the USB connector into the laptop to activate cooling. The ergonomic tilt makes typing easy while the soft outer material provides cushioned comfort on your lap. The open design allows fans to run quietly and stimulates constant airflow. Four rubber stops on the face of the Chill Mat prevents the laptop from slipping. The Targus Lap Chill Mat Jr. makes using your laptop an enjoyable experience.
title: Targus Lap Chill Mat Jr for 15.6" Laptop, Silver/Gray (AWE73US)
